markdown.markdown:
Hello there ! I'm **Roussel Desmond Nzoyem** (pronounced **zo-e-m**). To learn more about me, go to the [About](/about.qmd) and [CV](/cv.qmd) pages. You'll find some work I've contributed to in [Projects](/projects.qmd) and [Publications](/publications.qmd). For a nice read, go to the [Blog](/posts.qmd) section where you'll find interesting stories ranging many disciplines. Some very focused, and others quite random ! ## Selected publications A few of my HPC and ML publications are listed below. Please check the [Publications](/publications.qmd) section or my [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=80GLOSUAAAAJ&hl=en) for more papers. ::: {.figure-caption style="font-size: 0.9em;"} | Venue | Title | | |:----------------------------------------------------|:-------------------------------|:-------------------------------------------------------------------| | **ArXiv 2025** | Weight-Space Linear Recurrent Neural Networks | [Abstract](publications/nzoyem2025weightspace.qmd) | | **SCOPE @ ICLR 2025** | MixER: Better Mixture of Experts Routing for Hierarchical Meta-Learning | [Abstract](publications/nzoyem2025foundational.qmd) | | **CoLLAs 2025** | Reevaluating Meta-Learning Optimization Algorithms Through Contextual Self-Modulation | [Abstract](publications/nzoyem2025reevaluating.qmd) | | **ICLR 2025** | Neural Context Flows for Meta-Learning of Dynamical Systems | [Abstract](publications/nzoyem2025neural.qmd) | | **SC'W 2023** | A Comparison of Mesh-Free Differentiable Programming and Data-Driven Strategies for Optimal Control | [Abstract](publications/nzoyem2023comparison.qmd) | ::: I've reviewed for top conferences such as [**Euro-PAR'24**](https://2025.euro-par.org), [**ICLR'25**](https://iclr.cc), [**ICML'25**](https://icml.cc) (Top Reviewer), and [**NeurIPS'25**](https://neurips.cc). ## Selected stories - ###### [Linear Attention in JAX](/posts/linear-attention-jax/index.qmd) (Coming soon ...) - ###### [A parallel theory of the causal mind](/posts/parallel-mind-theory/index.qmd) - ###### [Welcome to my brand-new website !](/posts/welcome/index.qmd) - ###### [Mesh-free simulation in the age of Big Data](/posts/mesh-free-simulation/index.qmd) (Coming soon ...) Stay up to date with my blog posts by signing up for the [newsletter](/posts.qmd). ## News - **_10 Jun. 2025_** : I'm giving a flash talk the UoB's SciML in the Faculty of Engineering Workshop on a new adaptation mechanism I am extremely excited about: [Weight-Space Linear Recurrent Neural Networks](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.01153). ‚òû [Slides](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1I2VI_c3pV2xdjeHcSQo4FiyugjY7BIKV/view?usp=sharing) - **_19 May. 2025_** : I was in Montreal (Canada) for the CRM summer school on [Mathematical Foundations of Data Science](https://www.crmath.ca/en/activities/#/type/activity/id/3993). I also attended the workshop on [Optimization and learning: theory and applications](https://www.crmath.ca/en/activities/#/type/activity/id/3994) ! - **_22 Apr. 2025_** : I'm attending ICLR'25 in Singapore and presenting lots of stuff. This time again, I'm looking to connect and have as much fun as possible. ‚òû [LinkedIn Post](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/roussel-desmond-nzoyem_iclr2025-ncf-mixer-activity-7318565522189537280-rQEm?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop&rcm=ACoAAB61F7IBWaLUUAnVeGDAWO94NrKSMXnAWu4) - **_06 Mar. 2025_** : Our latest paper [MixER: Better Mixture of Experts Routing for Hierarchical Meta-Learning](https://openreview.net/forum?id=NteuHm0UXw) was unanimously accepted into the SCOPE workshop @ ICLR 2025. Looking forward to seeing everyone in Singapore ! - **_13 Feb. 2025_** : I gave a talk at the University of Bristol's EPS Seminar Series and the Engineering Design Society. It's about Neural Context Flows and follow-up work on foundational models for science. ‚òû [Slides](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1bJjbbQAohUw3EmT_N7iTpv5UY-wUvfAN/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=107359549014130993105&rtpof=true&sd=true) - **_22 Jan. 2025_** : I'm delighted to announce that our paper [Neural Context Flows](https://openreview.net/forum?id=8vzMLo8LDN) has been accepted to ICLR 2025. More info to come, including a blogpost with code and weights ! - **_07 May. 2024_** : I'm attending ICLR'24 in Vienna and presenting a poster at the workshop on [AI4DifferentialEquations in Science](https://ai4diffeqtnsinsci.github.io). I'm looking to have as much fun as possible. Please reach out if you're there as well :). - **_17 Apr. 2024_** : My profile now appears on the **Engineering Includes Me** wall in the University of Bristol's iconic Queen's Building. This rewards our after-school work with [Codemakers](https://github.com/ddrous/ks3-project). ‚òû [Blog Post](https://engineering.blogs.bristol.ac.uk/engineering-includes-me-roussel-desmond-nzoyem/)

More news!
- **_13 Mar. 2024_** : I'm going to the Turing Institute to attend the launch of their Probabilistic Programming theme. Looking forward to using [`Turing.jl`](https://github.com/TuringLang/Turing.jl) ! - **_20 Nov. 2023_** : I'm giving a talk at the 2nd workshop on Physics Enhancing Machine Learning in Applied Mechanics, held at the Institute of Physics in London, UK. ‚òû [Access my slides](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1DM1rC5qns4UA-MuWNPema72sYnKwcEw7/view?usp=sharing). - **_13 Nov. 2023_** : Our paper on mesh-free differential programming for optimal control is out during SuperComputing'23. ‚òû [Have a read here](https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/3624062.3626078){.external target="_blank"}. - **_18 Sep. 2023_** : I'm attending the 175th European Study Group with Industry (ESGI) in Berlin, Germany. ‚òû [Link](https://wias-berlin.de/workshops/ESGI-175/#:~:text=Group%20with%20Industry-,Berlin%2C%20September%2018%2D22%2C%202023,modelling%20or%20an%20optimisation%20problem){.external target="_blank"}. - **_01 Aug. 2023_** : I've pre-released version 0.1.4 of Updes: a mesh-free differentiable software for quick experimentation with a variety of PDEs. ‚òû [Repo](https://github.com/ddrous/Updec){.external target="_blank"}. - **_10 Mar. 2023_** : I gave a talk at [CMU Africa](https://www.africa.engineering.cmu.edu){.external target="_blank"} on emerging techniques and applications of graph neural networks. ‚òû [Recording](https://youtu.be/ahG-LG0ABRQ){.external target="_blank"}. - **_01 Dec. 2022_** : I began my research on AI, HPC, and Scientific Machine Learning for mesh-free simulations. ‚òû [Synopsis](http://www.bristol.ac.uk/cdt/interactive-ai/current-students/2021-cohort/nzoyem/){.external target="_blank"}. - **_10 Oct. 2021_** : I moved to Bristol for a PhD in the [Interactive AI CDT](https://www.bristol.ac.uk/cdt/interactive-ai/){.external target="_blank"}. Find pictures of my trips on ‚òû [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/roussel_dn/){.external target="_blank"}.
```{=html}
Reach out :)
```
